311 class V_COREEXPORT ObjectTypeRegistry {
312 public:
313  typedef Object *(*CreateEmptyFunc)(const std::string &name);
314  typedef Object *(*CreateFunc)(Object::Data *d);
315  typedef void (*DestroyFunc)(const std::string &name);
316 
317  struct FunctionTable {
318  CreateEmptyFunc createEmpty;
319  CreateFunc create;
320  DestroyFunc destroy;
321  };
322 
323  template<class O>
324  static void registerType(int id) {
325  assert(typeMap().find(id) == typeMap().end());
326  struct FunctionTable t = {
327  O::createEmpty,
328  O::createFromData,
329  O::destroy,
330  };
331  typeMap()[id] = t;
332  }
333 
334  static const struct FunctionTable &getType(int id);
335 
336  static CreateFunc getCreator(int id);
337  static DestroyFunc getDestroyer(int id);
338 
339 private:
340  typedef std::map<int, FunctionTable> TypeMap;
341 
342  static TypeMap &typeMap();
343 };
344 
346 #define V_CHECK(true_expr) \
347  if (!(true_expr)) { \
348  std::cerr << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << ": " \
349  << "CONSISTENCY CHECK FAILURE on " << this->getName() << " " << this->meta() << ": " \
350  << #true_expr << std::endl; \
351  std::stringstream str; \
352  str << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << ": consistency check failure: " << #true_expr; \
353  throw(vistle::except::consistency_error(str.str())); \
354  sleep(30); \
355  return false; \
356  }
357 
359 #define V_OBJECT(ObjType) \
360  public: \
361  typedef std::shared_ptr<ObjType> ptr; \
362  typedef std::shared_ptr<const ObjType> const_ptr; \
363  typedef ObjType Class; \
364  static Object::Type type(); \
365  static const char *typeName() { return #ObjType; } \
366  static std::shared_ptr<const ObjType> as(std::shared_ptr<const Object> ptr) { return std::dynamic_pointer_cast<const ObjType>(ptr); } \
367  static std::shared_ptr<ObjType> as(std::shared_ptr<Object> ptr) { return std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ObjType>(ptr); } \
368  static Object *createFromData(Object::Data *data) { return new ObjType(static_cast<ObjType::Data *>(data)); } \
369  std::shared_ptr<const Object> object() const override { return static_cast<const Object *>(this)->shared_from_this(); } \
370  Object::ptr cloneInternal() const override { \
371  const std::string n(Shm::the().createObjectId()); \
372  Data *data = shm<Data>::construct(n)(*d(), n); \
373  publish(data); \
374  return Object::ptr(createFromData(data)); \
375  } \
376  ptr clone() const { \
377  return ObjType::as(cloneInternal()); \
378  } \
379  ptr cloneType() const { \
380  return ObjType::as(cloneTypeInternal()); \
381  } \
382  Object::ptr cloneTypeInternal() const override { \
383  return Object::ptr(new ObjType(Object::Initialized)); \
384  } \
385  static Object *createEmpty(const std::string &name) { \
386  if (name.empty()) \
387  return new ObjType(Object::Initialized); \
388  auto d = Data::createNamed(ObjType::type(), name); \
389  return new ObjType(d); \
390  } \
391  template<class OtherType> \
392  static ptr clone(typename OtherType::ptr other) { \
393  const std::string n(Shm::the().createObjectId()); \
394  typename ObjType::Data *data = shm<typename ObjType::Data>::construct(n)(*other->d(), n); \
395  assert(data->type == ObjType::type()); \
396  ObjType *ret = dynamic_cast<ObjType *>(createFromData(data)); \
397  assert(ret); \
398  publish(data); \
399  return ptr(ret); \
400  } \
401  template<class OtherType> \
402  static ptr clone(typename OtherType::const_ptr other) { \
403  return ObjType::clone<OtherType>(std::const_pointer_cast<OtherType>(other)); \
404  } \
405  static void destroy(const std::string &name) { shm<ObjType::Data>::destroy(name); } \
406  void refresh() const override { Base::refresh(); refreshImpl(); } \
407  void refreshImpl() const; \
408  explicit ObjType(Object::InitializedFlags) : Base(ObjType::Data::create()) { refreshImpl(); } \
409  virtual bool isEmpty() override; \
410  virtual bool isEmpty() const override; \
411  bool check() const override { refresh(); if (isEmpty()) {}; if (!Base::check()) return false; return checkImpl(); } \
412  struct Data; \
413  const Data *d() const { return static_cast<Data *>(Object::m_data); } \
414  Data *d() { return static_cast<Data *>(Object::m_data); } \
415  /* ARCHIVE_REGISTRATION(override) */ \
416  ARCHIVE_REGISTRATION_INLINE \
417  protected: \
418  bool checkImpl() const; \
419  explicit ObjType(Data *data); \
420  ObjType(); \
421  private: \
422  ARCHIVE_ACCESS_SPLIT \
423  template<class Archive> \
424  void load(Archive &ar) { \
425  std::string name; \
426  ar & V_NAME(ar, "name", name); \
427  int type = Object::UNKNOWN; \
428  ar & V_NAME(ar, "type", type); \
429  if (!ar.currentObject()) \
430  ar.setCurrentObject(Object::m_data); \
431  d()->template serialize<Archive>(ar); \
432  assert(type == Object::getType()); \
433  } \
434  template<class Archive> \
435  void save(Archive &ar) const { \
436  int type = Object::getType(); \
437  std::string name = d()->name; \
438  ar & V_NAME(ar, "name", name); \
439  ar & V_NAME(ar, "type", type); \
440  const_cast<Data *>(d())->template serialize<Archive>(ar); \
441  } \
442  friend std::shared_ptr<const Object> Shm::getObjectFromHandle(const shm_handle_t &) const; \
443  friend shm_handle_t Shm::getHandleFromObject(std::shared_ptr<const Object>) const; \
444  friend Object *Object::create(Object::Data *); \
445  friend class ObjectTypeRegistry
446 
447 #define V_DATA_BEGIN(ObjType) \
448  public: \
449  struct V_COREEXPORT Data: public Base::Data { \
450  static Data *createNamed(Object::Type id, const std::string &name); \
451  Data(Object::Type id, const std::string &name, const Meta &meta); \
452  Data(const Data &other, const std::string &name) \
453 
454 #define V_DATA_END(ObjType) \
455  private: \
456  friend class ObjType; \
457  ARCHIVE_ACCESS \
458  template<class Archive> \
459  void serialize(Archive &ar); \
460  void initData(); \
461  }

466  return id; \
467  }

469 #define V_OBJECT_CREATE_NAMED(ObjType) \
470  ObjType::Data::Data(Object::Type id, const std::string &name, const Meta &meta) \
471  : ObjType::Base::Data(id, name, meta) { initData(); } \
472  ObjType::Data *ObjType::Data::createNamed(Object::Type id, const std::string &name) { \
473  Data *t = shm<Data>::construct(name)(id, name, Meta()); \
474  publish(t); \
475  return t; \
476  }
